1.1.1.1/8:

	CIDR: /8
	Indirizzo IP (Classe A): 1.1.1.1		00000001.00000001.00000001.00000001
	Subnet Mask: 255.0.0.0                  	11111111.00000000.00000000.00000000
	IP Network: 1.0.0.0                     	00000001.00000000.00000000.00000000
	IP Broadcast: 1.255.255.255 			00000001.11111111.11111111.11111111
	Host utilizzabili: (2^24)-2 = 16.777.214

128.1.6.5/12:

	CIDR: /12
	Indirizzo IP (Classe B): 128.1.6.5		10000000.00000001.00000110.00000101
	Subnet Mask: 255.240.0.0			11111111.11110000.00000000.00000000
	IP Network: 128.0.0.0				10000000.00000000.00000000.00000000
	IP Broadcast: 128.15.255.255 			10000000.00001111.11111111.11111111
	Host utilizzabili: (2^20)-2 = 1.048.574

	CIDR: /24

	Subnet Mask: 255.255.255.0			11111111.11111111.11111111.00000000
	IP Network: 200.1.2.0				11001000.00000001.00000010.00000000
	IP Broadcast: 200.1.2.255 			11001000.00000001.00000010.11111111
	Host utilizzabili: (2^8)-2 = 254

	CIDR: /16
	Indirizzo IP (Classe B): 172.16.0.4		10101100.00010000.00000000.00000100

	IP Network: 172.16.0.0				10101100.00010000.00000000.00000000
	IP Broadcast: 172.16.255.255			10101100.00010000.11111111.11111111
